theStarKnight:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theStarKnight:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theStarKnight:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theStarKnight:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theStarKnight:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theStarKnight:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theStarKnight:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theStarKnight:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theStarKnight:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theStarKnight:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theStarKnight:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theStarKnight:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theStarKnight:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theStarKnight:DeathGrip_SK.NAME: Death Grip
theStarKnight:DeathGrip_SK.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thestarknight:Constricted. NL Enemy loses !theStarKnight:SecondMagic! Strength.

theStarKnight:Stomp_SK.NAME: Stomp
theStarKnight:Stomp_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. thestarknight:Murder: Draw !M! card, and gain !M! energy

theStarKnight:FrenziedStrike_SK.NAME: Frenzied Strike
theStarKnight:FrenziedStrike_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and draw !M! less card next turn. Shuffle a NL Frenzied Strike into your draw pile.

theStarKnight:SolarFlare_SK.NAME: Solar Flare
theStarKnight:SolarFlare_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. Refund half X rounded down.

theStarKnight:KnifeGame_SK.NAME: Knife Game
theStarKnight:KnifeGame_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL your thestarknight:Madness NL !theStarKnight:SecondMagic! times.
